oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steel Workers Organize #3
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Strikes, Other Unions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Worker holding a newspaper about the Republic Steel massacre entering an organizing meeting. Second Panel: Workers holding picket signs. Third Panel: Man registering at the founding convention of the Congress of Industrial Organizations.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
